title: Token Skills
description: Token analysis skills powered by Moralis API

token_price.title: ERC20 Token Price
token_price.description: Get the token price denominated in the blockchain's native token and USD

address.description: The address of the token contract to get price for

include.description: If the result should contain the 24hr percent change (use 'percent_change')

exchange.description: The factory name or address of the token exchange

to_block.description: The block number from which the token price should be checked

max_token_inactivity.description: Exclude tokens inactive for more than the given amount of days

min_pair_side_liquidity_usd.description: Exclude tokens with liquidity less than the specified amount in USD

token_erc20_transfers.title: ERC20 Token Transfers
token_erc20_transfers.description: Get ERC20 token transactions ordered by block number

address.description: The address of the wallet to get ERC20 token transfers for

contract_addresses.description: List of contract addresses of transfers to filter by

from_block.description: The minimum block number from which to get the transactions

to_block.description: The maximum block number from which to get the transactions

from_date.description: The start date from which to get the transactions (any format accepted by momentjs)

to_date.description: Get the transactions up to this date (any format accepted by momentjs)

limit.description: The desired page size of the result

order.description: The order of the result, in ascending (ASC) or descending (DESC)

cursor.description: The cursor returned in the previous response (for pagination)

token_search.title: Token Search (Premium)
token_search.description: Search for tokens based on contract address, token name or token symbol. Premium endpoint available as an add-on. Requires a Moralis Business plan or Enterprise plan.

query.description: Search query - can be token address, token name or token symbol

limit.description: The desired page size of the result

token_analytics.title: Token Analytics
token_analytics.description: Get analytics for a token by token address

address.description: The token address to get analytics for
